str2: Therefore, then. Apparently a primary word; certainly, or accordingly.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To raise, lift up, take away, remove.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A stone; met: of Jesus as the chief stone in a building. Apparently a primary word; a stone.
A primary particle; but, and, etc.
Of Hebrew origin; Jesus, the name of our Lord and two other Israelites.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To raise, lift up, take away, remove.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
The eye; fig: the mind's eye. From optanomai; the eye; by implication, vision; figuratively, envy.
Up, above, up to the top, up to the brim, things above, heaven, the heavenly region. Adverb from anti; upward or on the top.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: Answer, bid, bring word, command. A primary verb; to speak or say.
Father, (Heavenly) Father, ancestor, elder, senior. Apparently a primary word; a 'father'.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: From eucharistos; to be grateful, i.e. to express gratitude; specially, to say grace at a meal.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative 2nd Person Singular
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
Neuter of hostis as conjunction; demonstrative, that; causative, because.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 2nd Person Singular
str2: To hear, listen, comprehend by hearing; pass: is heard, reported. A primary verb; to hear.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 1st Person Singular
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.
